name: Slots - Free 777 Slot Machines with Bonus Games
name_original: Slots - Free 777 Slot Machines with Bonus Games
description:
VIDEO SLOTS :

Slots is the new free video slots app for your iPhone & iPad.
Non stop excitement from the slot machines & the bonus games.
Unique new slot games added all the time.
Win free chips from bonus games, free spins, gifts,
Fun bonus games in every room to add to your excitement!
Get a welcome bonus of 20000 chips & 100 gold!

Download Slots now and play 12 different games for free today.
Choose from numerous unique rooms that allow you to play upto 50 lines at once. Maximize your wins & take the advantage against the house.
The lobby has an amazing layout that lets you get straight to the action.

TOURNAMENTS:

Take part in variety of slot tournaments that will pitch your skills against the World.
Different modes of slot tournaments let you play with your choice of entry cost.
The game has tournaments with three modes – Big Prize, Mega Prize, and Shootouts!

DAILY SPIN & FREE BONUSES:

Try out the daily spin to win lucrative prizes & look out for the special bonus every 2 hours for even more chances for free rewards.
Get huge coin rewards for having your friends play the game.

FEATURES:

Play all our Games for FREE!
A Daily Spin with all manner of lucrative prizes
Progressive Jackpots constantly ticking away on our Slot rooms! Each Unique to every room!
Win BIG
Tournaments running at every conceivable hour!
A special Bonus every 2 hours
Power Ups have been added to Slot rooms!!

Beside our amazing Slots game, we also have top casino games

Blackjack
Video Poker
Craps
Bingo
Keno
Roulette

There's always more! Our team is already developing content for our next major update!
 This game is for amusement purposes only & is intended for use by players 21 and over.
